identity.mission: Create a 'Bioluminescent Lake' aesthetic that bridges natural serenity with financial trust.
core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Nature x Fintech.
Emotion First: Calm trust in the dark, refreshing clarity in the light.
Content is King: Data is beautiful, not just functional.
Negative Space: Luxurious padding (p-8 is the new p-4).

theme_strategy.name: Bioluminescent Lake
theme_strategy.mode_behavior: Dark mode default (The Deep Lake). Light mode toggle (The Morning Mist).

body.usage: Body text, inputs, data tables. Use relaxed leading.

special.usage: Hero numbers, Deal Commission percentages, 'KAIF' branding elements.

rules: Overlines must be uppercase and tracking-widest.

glassmorphism.usage: Use for sticky headers, modal overlays, and floating action bars.

dashboard.rule: Every pixel utilized. No jagged bottoms. Use col-span logic for hierarchy.

marketing.rule: Never fill 100% of the grid. Leave breathing room.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:brightness-110 shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(45,212,191,0.3)] rounded-full px-8
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground rounded-full

cards.style: bg-card text-card-foreground border border-border shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: bg-background border-input focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/50 rounded-md h-12

hero_background.alt: Foggy sunrise over a mysterious lake
hero_background.usage: Landing page hero background with heavy overlay

category_organic.alt: Fresh organic vegetables in wooden box

trust_handshake.usage: About section or Deal Confirmation page

do_not: Do NOT use gradients for text.
Do NOT use emoji icons (use Lucide/Phosphor).
Do NOT center align main app container.
Do NOT use default 'blue' for links (use Teal or Amber).
must_do: MUST use data-testid on all interactive elements.
MUST use 2-3x more padding than standard.
MUST support Russian Cyrillic expansion in layouts.

instructions_to_main_agent: Configure tailwind.config.js with the provided color palette.
Implement the 'Deal System' with a visible 1.5% commission calculation in the UI.
Ensure the Language Switcher is prominent and accessible.
Use the provided image URLs for the landing page and categories.
Create a 'design_system' folder to store reusable pattern components.
